column5: Thank you for the posting help Iceguy and BillM.  10lb ling  whities snubbing our offerings
Great videos Chris. Glad you persevered through the posting process. If the ling was 10lbs, would you say those whities were in the 4-6lbs range? It IS interesting to see what goes on down there.
...Way cool, I like how quickly that ling blasted skyward.
great vid Chris lots of whitefish around
Awesome vids!  I too like seeing that ling skyrocketing to the surface the camara was blasted by chummed minnows awesome!  Thanks again!  G

Very cool, lings are weird fish if you ask me .  By the way, now that you've gotten the uploads going there's one more trick you can do.  When your entering your post here look down under the editting box to where it says post options and switch it to html on - auto linebreak mode.  Then instead of putting in a link you copy the value in the video page thats called "html code" and looks like this.     And voila you get the videos right in your post here on OFC!  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i225.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid225.photobucket.com/albums/dd49/cisco5577/PLUS0004.flv">  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i225.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid225.photobucket.com/albums/dd49/cisco5577/PLUS0006.flv">
wow great videos.  I hope in that ling video all those minnows were real and not plasctic.  it looked like the whole bottom was covered with them.  cheers!
Great quality on the video.  how deep were you?  Thanks for sharing.
Thats wild.  RF
Thanks for that great view of what goes on in the basement Chris !

Better'n watchin' TV, first time I watched something like that . . . .     who says fish are stupid . . . . .     they certainly were VERY cautious around the bait with the hooks? I've watched them on the Vex as l'il 'blips,' sometimes they'd rise 3' or more with the jig, before dropping back . . . .    musta watched 50 of 'em, over a whole morning one day, doing that . . . .    but nary a nudge? Wonder why?

Thanx TbayBoy. Will do next time.  Got 3 whitefish 2-3lbs then next day lost one 7lbs at the hole then yesterday pals got a 6 and a couple 3-4lbers.  Re minnows... dead ones. Limit is 120 in possession so over a few days of dumping a few dozen down each day.... once down they're no longer in possession... the bottom has some tempting treats.  That ling was 9.8lbs exactly. Here's my pal's 10 year old son Hank holding up his prize.
Awesome videos Chris.  I like the ling one.  Ziiiiing to the surface.  Joey
That was a very interesting video......I've always wondered what those whities are doing down there!!  Awesome stuff there!!  Thanks for posting that.......and keep them coming!!  Sinker
That was an awesome video! Glad you figured out how to do it!! My 2 year old wanted to kepp watching it!
Great vidoes! That ling is amazing!
awesome videos, I hear those ling taste pretty good, thanks for posting.
very cool Chris, nice videos
Yes, great videos. I remember Terry posting perch fishing videos from his camera a year ago, was neat to watch.
Excellent video and pics Chris.  Thanks for sharing.
good of you to share that footage  amazing!   nice hook set!  Truly Lord of The Lings Oscar Winner 2008..   Cheers!  ID1
